overview: A movie was released based on an actual brutal murder case. The lead actress, Sasa Handa, has won numerous awards. Megumi, a newspaper reporter, comes to the actress's house to do an interview. In order to approach the role, Handa meets with Kenichi Asakura, a convicted murderer and death row inmate. Asakura admits to killing thirteen headless corpses that came out of the Suzuki family's garden...
title: Tomatoes
